title.rendered: How to Setup and Start a New Transport Business in Dubai?

content.rendered:
The United Arab Emirates is the pre-eminent economic center in the Middle East. This country’s transition as one of the top four global commercial and investment hubs is primarily driven by Dubai. Foreign nationals, investors, and entrepreneurs from around the world are attracted to Dubai due to its strategic location, spectacular infrastructure, rapidly expanding economy, and diverse business. Thanks to the government’s zero-taxation policy on corporate and personal incomes and business-friendly immigration regulations, over 20,000 businesses are established annually in the UAE. About 8.5 million of the nearly 10 million people living in the UAE are of foreign nationalities.

 

The government’s economic operations are shifting away from reliance on oil-related businesses alone. This has resulted in government-led and business-related campaigns aimed at attracting foreign investors and businesses to the UAE. Their initiatives have already made the UAE’s economy one of the world’s fastest-growing. They named Dubai one of the top five best places to live and work in the globe. Due to the rising economy in the Middle East, transportation businesses are crucial to Dubai’s continued expansion. They put the economy on wheels, literally. In reality, Dubai’s transportation sector is one of its most important economic contributors.

 

Starting a transportation business is undeniably profitable. Is now a good time to start a business in the UAE? Undeniably so! Contact A&A Associate, business setup in Dubai, for assistance in how to start a transport business in Dubai.

Start a Logistics Company

Start a Transport Business in Dubai : Advantages

  • Strategic Location

Dubai is the most powerful business center in the Middle East and Africa, with easy access to Europe. In reality, Dubai is where East and West meet. Iraq, Iran, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Yemen, Bahrain, Qatar, Syria, Turkey, Kuwait, Jordan, and Egypt surround Dubai and the UAE. Dubai is well-connected to the rest of the world as a logistics and retail industry hub. Dubai’s retail industry is world-renowned; shoppers from all over the globe come to Dubai expressly for shopping. From international bus services and road transportation to freight companies, freight forwarding, courier services, sea freight logistics support, and other value-added services for the UAE and neighboring countries, the manner in which your company operates in the transportation industry will be crucial.

  • Leading-Edge Infrastructure

The marine, road, and air infrastructure of Dubai are unparalleled. With its world-leading road network, large seaports, worldwide shipping and logistics business assets, airports, and high-quality basic services, Dubai is attractive to foreign investors seeking to establish a transportation firm.

  • Advantages of Dubai for Businesses

The tax benefits for foreign nationals and enterprises controlled by foreigners are enticing incentives to live and work in the UAE. Dubai’s allure as a location for foreign investment, entrepreneurs, and job seekers has increased since the United Arab Emirates modified its immigration restrictions and revised its company policies to allow foreigners to fully own their enterprises.

This government does not demand a minimum capital commitment in order to establish a business, such as a transportation firm, in Dubai. Through free zones, each of which is devoted to a specific industry, the government may better help SMEs with specialized support centers, business accelerators, and incubators, among other resources.

Transportation Services Permitted in Dubai

There are numerous sorts of permitted transportation services in Dubai, UAE. When deciding to conduct business in Dubai, you can specialize in:

  • Transport of cargo by large trucks
  • Transport of freight by light trucks
  • Water transport service
  • Transportation and rental of heavy machinery
  • Car rental service
  • Bus rental transport services
  • Passenger travel (taxi services transport and tour buses)
  • Specialized rental automobiles such as trucks and transport
  • Motorcycles rentals service
  • Services for vehicle recovery and transport
  • Specialized transportation services including the carriage of petrol tanks, money, and valuables
  • Refrigerated transport
  • Petroleum transport
  • Bicycle rentals service
  • Vehicle Fleet Management services
  • Luxury automobile services

Click here to know How to Register a Company in Dubai From India?

How to Start a Transportation Company in Dubai

Transportation is a profitable business to start in Dubai. As previously stated, business in Dubai is expanding, which creates a tremendous demand for transportation services in order for those businesses to exist and develop. Here are the steps to Start a Transport Business in Dubai. For more information contact A&A Associate.

 

Step 1: Select a Business Structure for Your Transportation Company in the UAE

Dubai is well-known throughout the world for its unique free zones. Free zones are special economic zones established for specific businesses. These provide international investors with tax breaks and business support services tailored to their industry. Each free zone also provides investors with permits, as well as access to magnificent infrastructure, logistics company clients, skilled staff, and a significant volume of customers in need of transportation services.

Although the process has been simplified and expedited, a commercial license is still required to trade legally in the UAE. Free zones make it easy to apply for and obtain a license for your business in Dubai.

 

Step 2: Selecting and Registering the Company Name

Trade License Zone will assist you in choosing the best name for your company. According to the Registry Office, no offensive or blasphemous language, nor references to Islam or Allah, may be used in the business name. You may incorporate your name in the name of your corporation, but it must be used in its entirety rather than just your surname or initials. We will then see if the name is available for registration.

 

Step 3: Make company documents

We will need to apply for the notarization of your firm’s paperwork while we are assisting with the processing of your company and visa applications. This can only begin after your company name has been finalized and approved by the Registry Office. The Memorandum of Association (MOA) and Articles of Association (AOA) of the company with the Department of Economic Development in Dubai are necessary for notarization (D-DED).

 

Step 4: Submit your Application for a Business License

To operate a transportation company in Dubai, you must first obtain a commercial license before applying for a transportation license. These two processes are handled by distinct government agencies: the commercial license can be obtained through a free zone application with the Dubai Department of Economic Development, while your transport company license will be issued by the National Transport Authority.

In addition to your completed application form and business plan, you must also provide the following documentation:

  • Copies of shareholders’ and directors’ passports
  • Copy of the Registry Office’s trade name confirmation
  • Commercial license copy
  • Proof of authorization from city management agencies for the initial activity
  • Memorandum of Association Notarized (MOA)
  • Articles of Association Notarized (AOA)
  • Copy of the company’s physical address’s lease or property agreement
  • Payment for trade license: AED 100 is required for each passenger car utilized by the company, plus AED 5 for each passenger seat; vehicles hauling commercial products must pay AED 100 + AED 10 for each ton of the vehicle’s gross weight.

Read more about business license costs in Dubai 

 

Step 5: Obtaining a Business License

Once completed, the National Transport Authority will provide a business license to your organization. This process typically takes two weeks. Contact us for more information. 

 

Start a Transport Business in Dubai which is a profitable and long-term venture. A&A Associate created the company formation in Dubai and the transport company license process in the UAE with simplicity in handling the legal requirements in mind. A&A Associate’s dedication and in-depth understanding of the region, its markets, and its numerous customs and regulations result in the best. As a result, it is always a good idea to hire a UAE business setup in a Dubai company to advise you on your company’s licensing and setup depending on your demands and budget. When you engage with us, we will guide and handle the entire incorporation process for you, as well as walk you through the most recent government requirements pertaining to your transportation license and business. Contact us immediately for a customized price and a competitive advantage. You can reach us at sales@aaconsultancy.ae or +97142690673. We will give you a piece of mind that your license and visa applications are free of errors and omissions, which can lead to delays and rejection.
